version_description: This release addresses an issue where developers were unable to log into the app to watch videos. Thank you for your bug reports and feedback.
Download this update to get all the latest news and information for WWDC 2014 as it’s posted.
Now you can download session videos to watch on your iOS devices. This version also includes bug fixes.
This update addresses minor issues related to video downloads and session display times.
This release adds support for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus, as well as resolves a crash on launch issue for devices running iOS 8 or later.
This update includes iOS 9 compatibility and Picture in Picture support.

A tvOS version of this app is now available, so you can stream and download videos from WWDC 2016 and previous conferences on Apple TV. This update supports live streaming on iOS and tvOS. It also supports multitasking on iOS 9 on iPad.

Thank you for your bug reports and feedback. This update includes the following resolutions:

• News displays properly in all cases.
• Friday sessions display correctly on iPad with a time zone outside of PDT.
• The schedule updates correctly in all cases.
• VoiceOver label is correct for the shuttle stop on Thursday’s Bill Graham Civic Auditorium map.
• Videos on Apple TV are more stable.

Thank you for your feedback. This update is built for iOS 10, tvOS 10, and watchOS 3, and includes the following:

• New filters to show only downloaded videos or only unwatched videos
• Support for 3D Touch to peek and pop on session lists
• Support for Dark Mode on tvOS
• Fix for a crash that might occur on upgrade when paired with Apple Watch
• Fix for several crashes as reported by users

We’ve made several app updates to improve your experience in 2017, whether you’re attending or following along remotely. Now you can:

• Watch curated video playlists focused on featured themes.
• View interactive venue and street maps.
• See important venue information in the new Venue tab.
• Use all app features without signing in.

This minor update includes the following changes:

• Fixes a crash when watching videos within the schedule tab on iPad.
• Fixes a crash occurring in the app on Apple Watch.
• Improves browsing in featured videos.

We appreciate your continued feedback on the WWDC app. This update includes the following changes:

• Fixes an issue where previously downloaded videos were lost on upgrade.
• Keeps previously downloaded videos available when switching between SD and HD settings.
• Allows use of Handoff to easily move between iOS devices, or to Safari on macOS.
• Improves navigation on Apple TV when swiping up and down.
This update includes support for iOS 11 and iPhone X, as well as fixes for downloading videos and viewing photos.

Thank you for your feedback. This update includes improvements and bug fixes in several areas including maps, accessibility, and universal links.

We’ve made several changes to the WWDC app for 2018 to improve your experience, whether attending in person or watching from home. Videos are now front and center, so you can enjoy WWDC content more easily. Other updates include:

• New topic-based organization of videos, sessions, and labs.
• Significant redesign to make it simpler to find favorites, downloaded videos, sessions, and labs.
• Access to resources, documentation, sample code, and related content.
• Listings of related sessions, labs, and videos.

Thank you for your feedback. This update includes a fix for a problem where "Tomorrow" could incorrectly appear in the Schedule tab. We’ve also made improvements to the Videos tab to show live sessions more accurately.

Thank you for your feedback. This update includes bug fixes and improvements in several areas, including accessibility, stability, and video downloads. In addition, videos can be viewed by collection and platform on tvOS.

Thank you for your feedback. This update includes bug fixes and improvements in several areas, including accessibility, stability, and video downloads. In addition, videos can be viewed by collection and platform on tvOS.

感谢您的反馈。新功能包括：
• 新增“探索”标签页
• 增强了搜索界面
• 支持“深色”模式
• 注册 Apple Developer Program（仅限支持的国家/地区）
• 支持韩文
• 其他改进和错误修复

Thank you for your feedback. This update includes bug fixes and improvements in several areas, including accessibility, stability, and video downloads. In addition, videos can be viewed by collection and platform on tvOS.

Thank you for your feedback. This update includes bug fixes and improvements, including home screen quick actions, a today widget, support for the new iPad Pro, and a “Continue Watching” collection that lets you easily find and play videos you’ve already started.
感谢您的反馈。本更新包括对日文和简体中文的语言支持，支持“接力”，以及小幅改进和错误修复。
感谢您的反馈。本更新除了小幅改进和错误修复外，还新增了个人资料区域，方便您管理通知、虚拟参加实验室活动排队以及选择应用图标。

• 感谢您的反馈。此版本可让您：
• 以多种播放速度观看视频。
• 与完整的视频字幕互动。
• 从“探索”标签页分享报道并在网上查看。

• 还包括辅助功能改进，以及其他增强功能和错误修复

感谢您的反馈。此版本的新功能包括：
• 直接在 Apple 开发者 App 中打开新闻、文章和视频的外部链接
• 小幅错误修复和改进

感谢您的反馈。此版本的新功能：

• 重新设计的“探索”标签页有助于您追踪最新的报道、新闻和视频等内容。
• 新增了收藏单篇文章的选项，也可以收藏视频和研讨会内容。
• 更新了“浏览”标签页，可让您在其中搜索现有的研讨会、视频、文章和新闻。
• 更新了“WWDC”标签页为大会做好准备。
• 多项功能增强和错误修复。

感谢您的反馈。此版本的新功能：

• 在 iOS 14 上提供了全新的“探索”标签页并改进了对更大显示屏的支持。
• 在 iPadOS 14 上提供了全新边栏供您导航内容。
• 在 iOS 14 上改进了“搜索”标签页，让您更容易查找要观看的内容。
• 延长了登录会话的时长。
• 修复了错误并添加了其他各种增强功能。

• 修复了错误并添加了其他各种增强功能。

感谢您的反馈。此版本的新功能：

• 探索 WWDC21 提供的所有内容，包括展馆、研讨会视频、一对一实验室活动以及编程与设计挑战等等。
• 您可以直接在 Developer App 内注册 WWDC21 的实验室活动，以及接收临近预约的相关通知。
• 查看 WWDC21 的全新贴纸。
• 修复了错误并添加了其他各种增强功能。
